m_szDocSumamry: Solar Panel Market to Advance by 15.3% through 2015 August 22nd, 2012 by Adam Johnston     A recent report released from publisher Infiniti Research points to further growth for the global solar panel industry. The report finds advances in photovoltaic (PV) technologies will help the global  solar  panels market to increase by a compound annual growth rate of 15.3% between 2011 to 2015, the report said.
